page.title: 09Education in Sidcup District
page.content: Facilities for pre school aged children are varied,{playgroups and {nursery classes}are provided at a number of locations. The majority are private but the Council provides 2 part-time nursery classes. Schools draw their pupils from in and out of the district. There are{11 {Primary Schools:}Birkbeck, Dulverton, Holy Trinity, North Cray, St.Peter Chanel, Footscray, Longlands, Sidcup Hill and Royal Park. The{5 Secondary Schools}are: Sidcup School for Girls, Parklands (page 1), Chislehurst & Sidcup G.S., St.Marys & St.Josephs R.C. and Hurstmere. {2 independent schools:}Merton Court and St.Josephs Convent. The district also has a wide range of{adult education facilities providing for a wide range of subjects at locations around the district.
